rules_text:
[i]Engage![/i] – {U}{B}{R} [i](You may put this card under another legendary creature you own. They mutate into the creature on top plus all abilities from under it.)[/i]
[i]Contract[/i] – Whenever Veronica engages or whenever you cast a historic spell with mana value 4 or greater, gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap them. They gain haste until end of turn.
